term.title: mercaptals

item.text: A term once used for dithioacetals derived from aldehydes; its use is discouraged.

sources.item: PAC, 1995, 67, 1307. 'Glossary of class names of organic compounds and reactivity intermediates based on structure (IUPAC Recommendations 1995)' on page 1348 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199567081307)
